data.prayer: Lord, teach the young people in the state of Iwate to trust your Word and find the path of purity.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your word.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Iwate, Japan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,330,500 citizens of Iwate, Japan, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Iwate, Japan to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Lord, cause a passion for prayer among the people of Iwate, Japan.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Amami-Oshima, Southern people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Iwate, Japan to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Iwate, Japan to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 1,322,967 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.section_summary:
the state of Iwate, Japan has a population of 1,330,500.

We estimate Iwate has 7,533 people who might know Jesus, 21,243 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,301,724 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 176 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Iwate, Japan.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Iwate
